contest-event.event-date:
June 18, 1921 D Marsden Contest
Marsden Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
marsden-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Ing Lees Park, Marsden, West Yorkshire 19 bands entered, 18 bands competed. Bradford City disqualified for arriving too late to play #1 as they were drawn.
Choice of test pieces: "Le Prophete" or "Recollections of Wales"
Prizes: £20, £15, £10, £5, £2, 30s
Nov. 4, 2013, 8:46 p.m. May 29, 2021, 3:19 p.m.
1 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Noel Thorpe Recollections of Wales
2 Sowerby Bridge Subscription William Halliwell Le Prophete [arr. R. Rimmer]
3 Spenborough Victoria Joseph Crawford Dyson Le Prophete [arr. R. Rimmer]
4 Dobcross Silver Band J. Jennings Le Prophete [arr. R. Rimmer]
5 Hinchliffe Mill Band Joseph Crawford Dyson Le Prophete [arr. R. Rimmer]
6 Compstall Band G. Nicholls Le Prophete [arr. R. Rimmer]
Disqualified Bradford City Unknown
